Subject.message: 1#What is the value of the ratio between the biggest 4-digit natural number and the smallest natural number?#9999#infinito#0,9999#1

3#The solution of the differential equation y=y' with y(0)=1 is:#e^x#x#log(x)#0
4#If f(z) is an holomorphic function defined in a simply connected space, its integral on a closed path is:#0#f(0)#Not enough information#+inf
